![](assets/phillips_portrait_full.jpg){width=50%}


I am a Data Scientist who loves helping people solve challenging problems and tell impact stories to technical and non-technical stakeholders. I have experience across academia and industry building products and teams that generate insights from messy data. 

I'm most well known for [Healthcare Data Science](https://posit.co/resources/videos/flatironkitchen-how-we-overhauled-a-frankensteinian-sql-workflow-with-the-tidyverse), [Open Source Data Science](www.bookdown.org/ndphillips/yarrr), and [Decision Making Research](https://github.com/ndphillips/FFTrees).

## Experience

I have diverse experience as a research scientist, developer, manager, and team lead across academia and industry Each role and organization has taught me something new about how to solve problems and work with diverse stakeholders. I have done my best to create a legacy of contagious enthusiasm and practical tools with every organization I've been a part of.

See my [About](about.qmd) page or on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nathanieldphillips/) to learn more about my experience.

## Consulting

I offer a range of consulting services healthcare data science. I work with clients who want to make it easier to solve problems and answer questions from healthcare data. If you are have a project or question that you could use help with, I'd love to hear from you.

See [Consulting](consulting.qmd) to learn more.

## Contact

The best way to get in contact me is via email at nathaniel.d.phillips.is@gmail.com. 

If you'd like to meet, you can book a meeting with me at [https://calendly.com/nathaniel-d-phillips](https://calendly.com/nathaniel-d-phillips).
